name: FetchMember
description: Fetch a specific member from the queue

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Member resource(s) to fetch.

QueueSid.description: The SID of the Queue in which to find the members to fetch.

CallSid.description: The [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) SID of the resource(s) to fetch.

$ul: **call_sid**: The SID of the [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) the Member resource is associated with.
**date_enqueued**: The date that the member was enqueued, given in RFC 2822 format.
**position**: This member's current position in the queue.
**queue_sid**: The SID of the Queue the member is in.
**uri**: The URI of the resource, relative to `https://api.twilio.com`.
**wait_time**: The number of seconds the member has been in the queue.
